alert.note: Alert for Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 7:27PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Washington Parish through 830 PM CDT... At 726 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Franklinton, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Franklinton. There is some rotation with this storm and it would not be out of the question a funnel cloud. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
